trans-unit.id: You have reached the current maximum increment. Your inhabitants will not upgrade further.
trans-unit.source: You have reached the current maximum increment. Your inhabitants will not upgrade further.

trans-unit.id: You need more ${resource} to build this building.

trans-unit.target: Ihr benötigt mehr ${resource}, um dieses Gebäude errichten zu können.
trans-unit.note: In German $resource would be "Münzen" which means "Coins". In the game there is only GOLD I guess, so no coins, money or other notations

trans-unit.id: Some of your changes require a restart of Unknown Horizons.
trans-unit.source: Some of your changes require a restart of Unknown Horizons.
trans-unit.target: Einige Eurer Änderungen erfordern einen Neustart von Unknown Horizons.

trans-unit.id: This will delete all changes to the settings you made so far.
trans-unit.source: This will delete all changes to the settings you made so far.
trans-unit.target: All Eure bisherigen Änderungen werden hierdurch entfernt.

trans-unit.id:
The SDL renderer is meant as a fallback solution only and has serious graphical glitches.
Use at own risk!
trans-unit.source:
The SDL renderer is meant as a fallback solution only and has serious graphical glitches.
Use at own risk!
trans-unit.target:
Der SDL-Renderer ist ausschließlich als Reservesystem zu gebrauchen, da es zu ernsten Darstellungsproblemen kommen kann.
Verwendet ihn nur, wenn Ihr wisst, was Ihr tut!

trans-unit.id: Configured language %(lang)s at %(place)s could not be loaded
trans-unit.source: Configured language %(lang)s at %(place)s could not be loaded
trans-unit.target: Die eingestellte Sprache %(lang)s konnte nicht von %(place)s geladen werden

trans-unit.id: The port you specified is not valid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.source: The port you specified is not valid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.target: Der angegebene Port ist ungültig. Seine Nummer muss im Bereich zwischen 1 und 65535 liegen.

trans-unit.id: Please check the port you entered and make sure it's in the specified range.
trans-unit.source: Please check the port you entered and make sure it's in the specified range.
trans-unit.target: Bitte überprüft, ob der angegebene Port sich in diesem Bereich befindet.

trans-unit.id: Failed to apply new network data.
trans-unit.source: Failed to apply new network data.

trans-unit.id: Networking couldn't be initialised with the current configuration.
trans-unit.source: Networking couldn't be initialised with the current configuration.
trans-unit.target: Die Netzwerkfunktionen konnten mit den aktuellen Einstellungen nicht initialisiert werden.

trans-unit.id: Check the data you entered in the Network section.
trans-unit.source: Check the data you entered in the Network section.
trans-unit.target: Überprüft die Einstellungen im Abschnitt Netzwerk.

trans-unit.id: Low port numbers sometimes require special privileges, try one greater than 1024 or 0.
trans-unit.source: Low port numbers sometimes require special privileges, try one greater than 1024 or 0.
trans-unit.target: Niedrige Portnummern benötigen manchmal Sonderrechte, versucht es mit 0 oder einer Zahl größer als 1024.

trans-unit.note: There was a problem during the 'save game' procedure.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to quit Unknown Horizons?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to quit Unknown Horizons?
trans-unit.target: Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr Unknown Horizons beenden wollt?

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to abort the running session?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to abort the running session?
trans-unit.target: Wollt Ihr diese Partie wirklich beenden?

trans-unit.id: There are no saved games to load
trans-unit.source: There are no saved games to load
trans-unit.target: Es gibt keine Speicherstände zum Laden

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: loadgame) (text of widget: loadgame) Open a widget to select which game to load

trans-unit.id: A savegame with the name "%s" already exists. Should i overwrite it?
trans-unit.source: A savegame with the name "%s" already exists. Should i overwrite it?
trans-unit.target: Ein Spielstand mit dem Namen "%s" existiert bereits. Soll dieser überschrieben werden?

trans-unit.id: Please select a savegame or click on cancel.
trans-unit.source: Please select a savegame or click on cancel.
trans-unit.target: Bitte wählt einen Speicherstand aus oder klickt auf Abbrechen.

trans-unit.note: ok button has been pressed, but no savegame was selected
(text of widget: scenario_details) More text describing the scenario (text of widget: headline_details_label) More text describing the savegame

trans-unit.id: You need to select a savegame to delete
trans-unit.source: You need to select a savegame to delete
trans-unit.target: Ihr müsst einen Spielstand auswählen, um ihn zu entfernen

trans-unit.id: Do you really want to delete the savegame "%s"?
trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the savegame "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Wollt Ihr wirklich den Spielstand "%s" entfernen?

trans-unit.id: The multiplayer feature requires the library "pyenet", which couldn't be found on your system.
trans-unit.source: The multiplayer feature requires the library "pyenet", which couldn't be found on your system.
trans-unit.target: Der Mehrspielermodus benötigt die Bibliothek "Pyenet", welche nicht in Eurem System gefunden werden konnte.

trans-unit.id: Linux users: Try to install pyenet through your package manager.
trans-unit.source: Linux users: Try to install pyenet through your package manager.
trans-unit.target: Linux-Nutzer: Versucht, pyenet per Paketmanager zu installieren.

trans-unit.id: Windows users: There is currently no reasonable support for Windows.
trans-unit.source: Windows users: There is currently no reasonable support for Windows.

trans-unit.id: Check the data you entered in the Network section in the settings dialogue.
trans-unit.source: Check the data you entered in the Network section in the settings dialogue.
trans-unit.target: Bitte überprüft die Angaben im Abschnitt Netzwerk des Einstellungsmenüs.

trans-unit.id: Could not connect to master server. Please check your Internet connection. If it is fine, it means our master server is temporarily down. Details: %s
trans-unit.source: Could not connect to master server. Please check your Internet connection. If it is fine, it means our master server is temporarily down. Details: %s
trans-unit.target: Konnte keine Verbindung zum Masterserver aufbauen. Bitte überprüft Eure Internetverbindung. Wenn sie funktioniert, liegt das Problem bei unserem Server. Details: %s

trans-unit.id: Something went wrong with the network:
trans-unit.source: Something went wrong with the network:

trans-unit.id: The game's version differs from your version. Every player in a multiplayer game must use the same version. This can be fixed by every player updating to the latest version. Game version: %(gameversion)s Your version: %(ownversion)s
trans-unit.source: The game's version differs from your version. Every player in a multiplayer game must use the same version. This can be fixed by every player updating to the latest version. Game version: %(gameversion)s Your version: %(ownversion)s
trans-unit.target: Die Spielversion des Erstellers weicht von Eurer ab. Im Mehrspielermodus müsst Ihr die gleiche Version verwenden wie alle Mitspieler. Dies kann behoben werden, indem jeder Spieler seine Version auf den neuesten Stand bringt. Spielversion: %(gameversion)s Eure Version: %(ownversion)s
Ihr habt einen ungültigen Spielernamen eingegeben

trans-unit.id: The selected file is not a valid scenario file.
trans-unit.source: The selected file is not a valid scenario file.
trans-unit.target: Die ausgewählte Datei ist kein gültiges Szenario.

trans-unit.id: Please report this to the author.
trans-unit.source: Please report this to the author.

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: headline) set translated building name in gui
Only use boat or ship - so here "Schiffbau-Übersicht"

trans-unit.id: Can't equip trade ship with weapons
trans-unit.source: Can't equip trade ship with weapons

trans-unit.id: It is not possible to equip a trade ship with weapons
trans-unit.source: It is not possible to equip a trade ship with weapons
trans-unit.target: Ihr könnt Handelsschiffe nicht mit Waffen ausrüsten

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: headline) (text of widget: settler_score)

trans-unit.id: The ship needs to be close to an island to found a settlement.
trans-unit.source: The ship needs to be close to an island to found a settlement.
trans-unit.target: Euer Schiff muss sich nahe vor unbesiedeltem Land befinden, um eine Siedlung zu gründen.

trans-unit.id: There is nothing written in your logbook yet!
trans-unit.source: There is nothing written in your logbook yet!
trans-unit.target: Es gibt noch keine Einträge in Eurem Logbuch!

trans-unit.id: String Previewer Tool for Scenario files
trans-unit.source: String Previewer Tool for Scenario files

trans-unit.id: select a scenario and click on load/reload to update the messages in the captain's log
trans-unit.source: select a scenario and click on load/reload to update the messages in the captain's log
trans-unit.target: Wählt ein Szenario aus und klickt auf Laden, um die angezeigten Einträge zu aktualisieren

trans-unit.id: Pavilion: Fulfills religious needs of sailors.
trans-unit.source: Pavilion: Fulfills religious needs of sailors.
trans-unit.target: Pavillon: Erfüllt religiöse Bedürfnisse Eurer Bevölkerung.

trans-unit.id: Fisherman: Fishes the sea, produces food.
trans-unit.source: Fisherman: Fishes the sea, produces food.
trans-unit.target: Fischer: Befischt die See, produziert Nahrung.

trans-unit.id: Hunter: Hunts wild forest animals, produces food.
trans-unit.source: Hunter: Hunts wild forest animals, produces food.

trans-unit.id: Signal fire: Allows the player to trade with the free trader.
trans-unit.source: Signal fire: Allows the player to trade with the free trader.
trans-unit.target: Leuchtfeuer: Erlaubt Handel mit dem Freien Händler.

trans-unit.id: Lumberjack: Chops down trees and turns them into boards.
trans-unit.source: Lumberjack: Chops down trees and turns them into boards.
trans-unit.target: Holzfäller: Fällt Holz und verarbeitet es zu Brettern.

trans-unit.id: Main square: Supplies citizens with goods.
trans-unit.source: Main square: Supplies citizens with goods.
trans-unit.target: Marktplatz: Versorgt die Einwohner mit Gütern.

trans-unit.id: Storage: Extends stock and provides collectors.
trans-unit.source: Storage: Extends stock and provides collectors.
trans-unit.target: Lagerzelt: Erweitert die Lagerkapazität und stellt Träger bereit.
Pfad: Wird zum Transport von Gütern benötigt.

trans-unit.id: Boat builder: Builds boats and small ships. Built on coast.
trans-unit.source: Boat builder: Builds boats and small ships. Built on coast.
trans-unit.target: Bootsbauer: Baut Boote und kleine Schiffe. Muss an der Küste errichtet werden.

trans-unit.id: Clay pit: Gets clay from deposit.
trans-unit.source: Clay pit: Gets clay from deposit.

trans-unit.target: Brennerei: Zuckerrohr wird hier zu Spirituosen veredelt.

trans-unit.id: Farm: Grows field crops and raises livestock.
trans-unit.source: Farm: Grows field crops and raises livestock.
trans-unit.target: Farm: Bewirtschaftet Felder und hält Nutztiere.

trans-unit.id: Pasture: Raises sheep. Produces wool. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Pasture: Raises sheep. Produces wool. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Weide zur Schafzucht: Produziert Wolle. Benötigt eine Farm.

trans-unit.id: Potato field: Yields food. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Potato field: Yields food. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Kartoffelfeld: Produziert Nahrung. Benötigt eine Farm.

trans-unit.id: Sugarcane field: Used in liquor production. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Sugarcane field: Used in liquor production. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Zuckerrohrfeld: Verwendung für Spirituosen. Benötigt eine Farm.
Dorfschule: Fördert die Bildung Eurer Untertanen.

trans-unit.id: Weaver: Turns lamb wool into cloth.
trans-unit.source: Weaver: Turns lamb wool into cloth.

trans-unit.id: Butchery: Needs pigs or cattle. Produces food.
trans-unit.source: Butchery: Needs pigs or cattle. Produces food.

trans-unit.id: Cattle run: Raises cattle. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Cattle run: Raises cattle. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Viehweide: Zieht Schlachtvieh auf. Benötigt eine Farm.

trans-unit.id: Charcoal burning: Burns a lot of boards to charcoal.
trans-unit.source: Charcoal burning: Burns a lot of boards to charcoal.
trans-unit.target: Kohlenmeiler: Ein Köhler stellt hier Holzkohle aus Brettern her.
Mine: Baut Erze aus Lagerstätten ab.

trans-unit.id: Pigsty: Raises pigs. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Pigsty: Raises pigs. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Schweinestall: Zieht Schweine auf. Benötigt eine Farm.

trans-unit.id: Salt ponds: Evaporates salt. Built on sea coast.
trans-unit.source: Salt ponds: Evaporates salt. Built on sea coast.
trans-unit.target: Salzgarten: Verdunstet Meerwasser zur Salzgewinnung. Muss an der Küste errichtet werden.

trans-unit.id: Smeltery: Refines all kind of ores.
trans-unit.source: Smeltery: Refines all kind of ores.

trans-unit.target: Taverne: Erfüllt den Gemeinschaftssinn Eurer Untertanen.

trans-unit.id: Tobacco field: Produces tobacco. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.source: Tobacco field: Produces tobacco. Needs a farm.
trans-unit.target: Tabakplantage: Produziert Tabakpflanzen. Benötigt eine Farm.

trans-unit.id: Tobacconist: Produces tobaccos out of tobacco.
trans-unit.source: Tobacconist: Produces tobaccos out of tobacco.

trans-unit.id: Toolmaker: Produces tools out of iron.
trans-unit.source: Toolmaker: Produces tools out of iron.

trans-unit.id: You need to found a settlement before you can construct buildings!
trans-unit.source: You need to found a settlement before you can construct buildings!
trans-unit.target: Ihr müsst eine Siedlung gründen, bevor Ihr Gebäude errichten könnt!

trans-unit.id: Select your ship and approach the coast via right-click.
trans-unit.source: Select your ship and approach the coast via right-click.
trans-unit.target: Wählt Euer Schiff an und nähert Euch der Küste per Rechtsklick.

trans-unit.id: Afterwards, press the large button in the ship overview tab.
trans-unit.source: Afterwards, press the large button in the ship overview tab.
trans-unit.target: Danach klickt auf den großen Knopf im Übersichtstab des Schiffes.

alt-trans.target: Danach klickt auf den großen Knopf im Übersichts-Tab des Schiffes.

trans-unit.note: (tooltip of widget: city_info_inhabitants) (text of widget: inhabitants)

trans-unit.id: Click to change the name of your settlement.
trans-unit.source: Click to change the name of your settlement.
trans-unit.target: Hier klicken, um den Namen Eurer Siedlung zu ändern.

trans-unit.note: bitte nicht wieder in 'Name' zurueck aendern. ~eoc
(tooltip of widget: okButton) (tooltip of widget: apply_new_nickname)
(text of widget: BB_cancel_build_label) abort construction of a ship, lose invested resources
(text of widget: BB_cancel_warning_label) abort construction of a ship, lose invested resources
(text of widget: BB_current_order) Information about the ship currently under construction at the boat builder

trans-unit.id: To build a boat, click on one of the class tabs, select the desired ship and confirm the order.
trans-unit.source: To build a boat, click on one of the class tabs, select the desired ship and confirm the order.
trans-unit.target: Um ein Schiff zu bauen, wählt zunächst die gewünschte Kategorie aus und danach das gewünschte Schiff. Bestätigt anschließend Euren Auftrag.

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: BB_progress_label) Refers to the resources still missing to complete the current boat builder task
(tooltip of widget: BB_cancel_button) abort construction of a ship, lose invested resources
(tooltip of widget: toggle_active_active) Pauses the current ship production, can be resumed later
(tooltip of widget: toggle_active_inactive) Resumes the currently paused ship production
(tooltip of widget: running_costs_label) (text of widget: running_costs_label) (tooltip of widget: running_costs_label) (tooltip of widget: running_costs) (text of widget: running_costs)
(tooltip of widget: BB_build_trade_1) (tooltip of widget: BB_build_war1_1)

trans-unit.id: Click on slot icon to toggle mode:
trans-unit.source: Click on slot icon to toggle mode:
trans-unit.target: Auf Icon klicken, um Slotmodus zu ändern:

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: buy_expenses_label) (text of widget: buying_label)
(text of widget: taxes_label) (text of widget: taxes)

trans-unit.id: Show resources produced in this settlement
trans-unit.source: Show resources produced in this settlement
trans-unit.target: Anzeige bisher produzierter Waren dieser Siedlung

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: ally_label) Diplomacy state of player
(text of widget: enemy_label) Diplomacy state of player
"neutral" klein normalerweise ... ich weiß nicht, wo es zur Verwendung kommt

(tooltip of widget: paid_taxes_icon) (tooltip of widget: taxes) (tooltip of widget: paid_taxes_icon) (tooltip of widget: taxes) (tooltip of widget: paid_taxes_icon) (tooltip of widget: taxes) (tooltip of widget: paid_taxes_label) (tooltip of widget: taxes)

(tooltip of widget: tax_rate_icon) (tooltip of widget: tax_val_label) (tooltip of widget: tax_rate_icon) (tooltip of widget: tax_val_label) (tooltip of widget: tax_rate_icon) (tooltip of widget: tax_val_label) (tooltip of widget: paid_taxes_label) (tooltip of widget: tax_val_label)

trans-unit.id: This is the current maximum increment!
trans-unit.source: This is the current maximum increment!
trans-unit.target: Dies ist die momentan höchste spielbare Stufe!

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: collector_utilisation_label) Percentage describing how much time the collectors were idle (not collecting resources for this building's inventory)

trans-unit.id: This is a resource deposit where you can build a mine to dig up resources.
trans-unit.source: This is a resource deposit where you can build a mine to dig up resources.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist ein Rohstoffvorkommen. Errichtet eine Mine, um an die Rohstoffe zu gelangen.

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: res_dep_description_lbl2) It == The resource deposit
(tooltip of widget: happiness_label) (tooltip of widget: happiness)
(tooltip of widget: residents_label) (tooltip of widget: inhabitants)

trans-unit.id: Click to change the name of this ship.
trans-unit.source: Click to change the name of this ship.
trans-unit.target: Klickt hier, um dieses Schiff umzutaufen.

trans-unit.id: The signal fire shows the free trader how to reach your settlement in case you want to buy or sell goods.
trans-unit.source: The signal fire shows the free trader how to reach your settlement in case you want to buy or sell goods.
trans-unit.target: Das Signalfeuer weist dem Freien Händler den Weg zu Eurer Siedlung. Es wird benötigt, um Handel zu treiben.

trans-unit.id: This is the free trader's ship. It will visit you from time to time to buy or sell goods.
trans-unit.source: This is the free trader's ship. It will visit you from time to time to buy or sell goods.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist das Schiff des Freien Händlers. Er wird von Zeit zu Zeit Eure Siedlung besuchen und nach Angeboten Ausschau halten.

trans-unit.note: (tooltip of widget: delete_bo) Trade route entry
(tooltip of widget: move_down) Trade route entry
(tooltip of widget: move_up) Trade route entry
(tooltip of widget: cancelButton) Captain's Log: logbook/diary used in scenarios
(tooltip of widget: backwardButton) Entry of Captain's Log (logbook/diary used in scenarios)
(tooltip of widget: forwardButton) Entry of Captain's Log (logbook/diary used in scenarios)
(tooltip of widget: cancelButton) Players either select the next scenario they want to play or press this button
(tooltip of widget: choose_scenario) Select which scenario to play
(text of widget: lbl_wait_at_load) Trade route setting: Whether to wait until all goods could be loaded.
(text of widget: lbl_wait_at_unload) Trade route setting: Whether to wait until all goods could be unloaded.
(tooltip of widget: add_bo) List of harbors in trade route
General Question: Is it money or gold that is used in UH?
(text of widget: player_name) (text of widget: settlement_name) (text of widget: ship_name)
(tooltip of widget: aggressive) Description of combat stance (how units behave when fighting)
(tooltip of widget: flee) Description of combat stance (how units behave when fighting)
(tooltip of widget: hold_ground) Description of combat stance (how units behave when fighting)

trans-unit.id: The FIFE and Unknown Horizons development teams
trans-unit.source: The FIFE and Unknown Horizons development teams
trans-unit.target: Die Entwicklerteams von FIFE und Unknown Horizons
{UMSCHALT} = Gedrückt halten, um mehrere Gebäude zu platzieren

trans-unit.note:
This sentence goes beyond the page border on the right. There needs to be an automatically inserte break.
{SHIFT} breaks automatically, so why does {T} not break?
(tooltip of widget: okButton) (tooltip of widget: cancelButton)
(text of widget: help) (text of widget: help) Main / in-game menu entry
(text of widget: settings) (text of widget: settings) Main / in-game menu entry (text of widget: headline)
(text of widget: quit) Completely shut down UH
(text of widget: start) Opens widget to create singleplayer games (campaigns, scenarios, random maps, free play)
(text of widget: start_multi) Opens widget to join or create multiplayer games

trans-unit.id: The game will start as soon as enough players have joined.
trans-unit.source: The game will start as soon as enough players have joined.
trans-unit.target: Das Spiel startet, sobald genug Spieler verbunden sind.

trans-unit.note: (text of widget: exit_to_main_menu_lbl) (text of widget: main_menu_label)

trans-unit.id: Show only games with the same version:
trans-unit.source: Show only games with the same version:

trans-unit.target: Liste der offenen Spiele neu laden
Intervall für autom. Sicherung in Minuten:

trans-unit.note: Ist nicht falsch, aber im PC-/Internetumfeld schreibt man eigentlich immer "Grafik".

trans-unit.id: Please make sure that you know what you do.
trans-unit.source: Please make sure that you know what you do.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist der Einstellungsdialog. Handelt weise!

trans-unit.note: (tooltip of widget: okButton) (tooltip of widget: okay)
(text of widget: choose_map_lbl) (text of widget: headline_choose_map_lbl) (text of widget: choose_map_lbl)
(text of widget: lbl_free_trader) Whether to create this kind of player in the game.
(text of widget: lbl_pirates) Whether to create this kind of player in the game.

trans-unit.id: Error: Invalid syntax in --mp-master commandline option. Port must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.source: Error: Invalid syntax in --mp-master commandline option. Port must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Der --mp-master Kommandozeilenoption wurde ein falscher Wert übergeben. Es muss sich beim Port um eine Zahl zwischen 1 und 65535 handeln.

trans-unit.id: Error: Invalid syntax in --mp-bind commandline option. Port must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.source: Error: Invalid syntax in --mp-bind commandline option. Port must be a number between 1 and 65535.
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Der --mp-bind Kommandozeilenoption wurde ein falscher Wert übergeben. Es muss sich beim Port um eine Zahl zwischen 1 und 65535 handeln.

trans-unit.id: The game you selected couldn't be started.
trans-unit.source: The game you selected couldn't be started.
trans-unit.target: Das ausgewählte Spiel konnte nicht gestartet werden.

trans-unit.id: The savegame might be broken or has been saved with an earlier version.
trans-unit.source: The savegame might be broken or has been saved with an earlier version.
trans-unit.target: Der Speicherstand ist defekt oder liegt in einer inkompatiblen Version vor.
Fehler: Die Karte "%s" konnte nicht gefunden werden.

trans-unit.id: Error: campaign filenames have to end in ".yaml".
trans-unit.source: Error: campaign filenames have to end in ".yaml".

trans-unit.id: Due to technical reasons, the campaign file will be copied to the UH campaign directory (%s).
trans-unit.source: Due to technical reasons, the campaign file will be copied to the UH campaign directory (%s).
trans-unit.target: Aus technischen Gründen wird die Kampagne in das Kampagnenverzeichnis von UH kopiert (%s).

trans-unit.id: This means that changes in the file you specified will not apply to the game directly.
trans-unit.source: This means that changes in the file you specified will not apply to the game directly.
trans-unit.target: Daher werden Änderungen in der angegebenen Datei nicht direkt im Spiel sichtbar sein.

trans-unit.id: To see the changes, either always start UH with the current arguments or edit the file %s.
trans-unit.source: To see the changes, either always start UH with the current arguments or edit the file %s.
trans-unit.target: Um sie zu sehen, sollte UH immer mit den momentanen Argumenten gestartet oder die Datei %s bearbeitet werden.
Fehler: Die Kampagne "%s" konnte nicht gefunden werden.
Fehler: Der Spielstand "%s" konnte nicht gefunden werden.
Fehler: Keine automatisch gespeicherten Spielstände gefunden.

trans-unit.id: You cannot change the speed of a multiplayer game
trans-unit.source: You cannot change the speed of a multiplayer game
trans-unit.target: Die Geschwindigkeit kann im Mehrspielermodus nicht geändert werden

trans-unit.id: Save/load for multiplayer games is not possible yet
trans-unit.source: Save/load for multiplayer games is not possible yet
trans-unit.target: Speichern/Laden ist im Mehrspieler-Modus noch nicht möglich

trans-unit.id: Error: don't know how to handle %(type)s condition type
trans-unit.source: Error: don't know how to handle %(type)s condition type
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Verwendungsweise einer Bedingung vom Typ %(type)s unbekannt

trans-unit.id: Error: Cannot find campaign with file "%s".
trans-unit.source: Error: Cannot find campaign with file "%s".
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Konnte die Kampagne "%s" nicht finden.
Fehler: Das Szenario "%s" konnte nicht gefunden werden.

trans-unit.id: Error: Cannot find scenario with file "%s".
trans-unit.source: Error: Cannot find scenario with file "%s".
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Konnte das Szenario "%s" nicht finden.

trans-unit.note: What is this - the red "snake" at the end of the sentence? Some code from MS WORD?

trans-unit.id: An error happened during quicksave. Your game has not been saved.
trans-unit.source: An error happened during quicksave. Your game has not been saved.
trans-unit.target: Es trat ein Fehler beim Schnellspeichern auf. Das Spiel wurde nicht gespeichert.

trans-unit.id: If this error happens again, please contact the development team:
trans-unit.source: If this error happens again, please contact the development team:
trans-unit.target: Sollte dieser Fehler erneut auftreten, nehmt bitte Kontakt zu den Entwicklern auf:

trans-unit.id: You need to quicksave before you can quickload.
trans-unit.source: You need to quicksave before you can quickload.
trans-unit.target: Ihr müsst zuerst die Schnellspeicherfunktion verwenden, bevor Ihr einen solchen Spielstand laden könnt.

trans-unit.id: There has been an error while creating your savegame file.
trans-unit.source: There has been an error while creating your savegame file.
trans-unit.target: Ein Fehler beim Anlegen des Speicherstands ist aufgetreten.

trans-unit.id: This usually means that the savegame name contains unsupported special characters.
trans-unit.source: This usually means that the savegame name contains unsupported special characters.
trans-unit.target: Ein möglicher Grund sind nicht unterstützte Sonderzeichen im Dateinamen.
Datei wird von einem anderen Prozess verwendet

trans-unit.id: The savegame file is currently used by another program.
trans-unit.source: The savegame file is currently used by another program.
trans-unit.target: Ein anderes Programm hat momentan den Zugriff auf diesen Speicherstand gesperrt.

trans-unit.id: Enable debug output to stderr and a logfile.
trans-unit.source: Enable debug output to stderr and a logfile.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviert die Fehlerausgabe nach stderr und in eine Logdatei.

trans-unit.id: Specify the path to FIFE root directory.
trans-unit.source: Specify the path to FIFE root directory.
trans-unit.target: Gebt den Pfad zum FIFE-Hauptverzeichnis an.

trans-unit.id: Restores the default settings. Useful if Unknown Horizons crashes on startup due to misconfiguration.
trans-unit.source: Restores the default settings. Useful if Unknown Horizons crashes on startup due to misconfiguration.
trans-unit.target: Stellt die Standardeinstellungen her. Sinnvoll, falls Unknown Horizons aufgrund einer Fehlkonfiguration nicht startet.
Alternativen Hauptserver für den Mehrspieler-Modus festlegen.

trans-unit.id: Specify network address to bind local network client to. This is useful if NAT holepunching is not working but you can forward a static port.
trans-unit.source: Specify network address to bind local network client to. This is useful if NAT holepunching is not working but you can forward a static port.
trans-unit.target: Gebt eine lokale Netzwerkadresse für den Multiplayermodus an. Dies wird benötigt, wenn NAT den Spielaufbau unterbindet, Ihr aber einen statischen Port über die Firewall oder den Router öffnen und weiterleiten könnt.

trans-unit.note: please don't translate anything in <tags> - thanks!

trans-unit.id: Starts a random map with seed <seed>.
trans-unit.source: Starts a random map with seed <seed>.

trans-unit.target: Startet <scenario>. <scenario> ist der Name des Szenarios.
Startet <campaign>. <campaign> ist der Name der Kampagne.

trans-unit.id: Starts the development map without displaying the main menu.
trans-unit.source: Starts the development map without displaying the main menu.
trans-unit.target: Starte direkt die Entwicklungskarte, ohne das Hauptmenü anzuzeigen.

trans-unit.id: Loads a saved game. <save> is the savegamename.
trans-unit.source: Loads a saved game. <save> is the savegamename.
trans-unit.target: Lädt einen gespeicherten Spielstand. <save> ist der Spielstand.
trans-unit.note: please don't translate anything in <tags> - thanks!

trans-unit.id: Sets the seed used to generate trees, fish, and other natural resources.
trans-unit.source: Sets the seed used to generate trees, fish, and other natural resources.
trans-unit.target: Setzt den Seed, vermittels dessen Bäume, Fisch und andere natürliche Rohstoffe generiert werden.

trans-unit.id: Uses <ai_players> AI players (excludes the possible human-AI hybrid; defaults to 1).
trans-unit.source: Uses <ai_players> AI players (excludes the possible human-AI hybrid; defaults to 1).
trans-unit.target: Verwendet <ai_players> KI-Spieler (ohne möglichen Mensch-KI Hybriden; standardmäßig 1).

trans-unit.id: Makes the human player a human-AI hybrid (for development only).
trans-unit.source: Makes the human player a human-AI hybrid (for development only).
trans-unit.target: Erstellt einen Mensch-KI Hybriden aus menschlichem Spieler (nur für Entwickler).

trans-unit.id: Shows AI plans as highlights (for development only).
trans-unit.source: Shows AI plans as highlights (for development only).
trans-unit.target: Anzeige der KI-Pläne per Farbhighlight (nur für Entwickler).

trans-unit.id: Write debug output only to logfile, not to console. Implies -d.
trans-unit.source: Write debug output only to logfile, not to console. Implies -d.
trans-unit.target: Schreibe die Fehlerausgabe nur in eine Logdatei, nicht aber in die Konsole. Impliziert -d.

trans-unit.id: Enable logging for a certain logging module (for developing only).
trans-unit.source: Enable logging for a certain logging module (for developing only).
trans-unit.target: Aktiviere Logging für ein bestimmtes Logging-Modul (nur für Entwickler).

trans-unit.id: Writes log to <filename> instead of to the uh-userdir
trans-unit.source: Writes log to <filename> instead of to the uh-userdir
trans-unit.target: Schreibt Log nach <filename> anstatt in das Benutzerverzeichnis
trans-unit.note: please don't translate anything in <tags> - thanks!

trans-unit.id: Enable the string previewer tool for scenario writers
trans-unit.source: Enable the string previewer tool for scenario writers
trans-unit.target: Starte die Vorschau von Logbucheinträgen in Szenarios

trans-unit.id: We are very sorry for this, and want to fix this error.
trans-unit.source: We are very sorry for this, and want to fix this error.
trans-unit.target: Es tut uns Leid, wir wollen diesen Fehler beheben.

trans-unit.id: In order to do this, we need the information from the logfile:
trans-unit.source: In order to do this, we need the information from the logfile:
trans-unit.target: Um dies zu tun, benötigen wir die Informationen aus der Protokolldatei:

trans-unit.id: Please give it to us via IRC or our forum, for both see unknown-horizons.org .
trans-unit.source: Please give it to us via IRC or our forum, for both see unknown-horizons.org .
trans-unit.target: Bitte lasst es uns über IRC oder unser Forum zukommen, beides findet Ihr unter unknown-horizons.org .

trans-unit.id: Error: Unable to find required libraries
trans-unit.source: Error: Unable to find required libraries
trans-unit.target: Fehler: Konnte benötigte Bibliotheken nicht finden

trans-unit.id: We are sorry to inform you that a library that is required by Unknown Horizons, is missing and needs to be installed.
trans-unit.source: We are sorry to inform you that a library that is required by Unknown Horizons, is missing and needs to be installed.
trans-unit.target: Eine von Unknown Horizons benötigte Systembibliothek scheint leider zu fehlen und muss daher installiert werden.

trans-unit.id: Installers for Windows users are available at "http://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAML", Linux users should find it in their packagement management system under the name "pyyaml" or "python-yaml".
trans-unit.source: Installers for Windows users are available at "http://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAML", Linux users should find it in their packagement management system under the name "pyyaml" or "python-yaml".
trans-unit.target: Installationsprogramme für Windows-Nutzer findet Ihr unter "http://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAML", Linux-Nutzer sollten die Pakete "pyyaml" oder "python-yaml" per Paketmanager installieren.

trans-unit.id: Thank you for using Unknown Horizons!
trans-unit.source: Thank you for using Unknown Horizons!
trans-unit.target: Danke für das Verwenden von Unknown Horizons!
